attributes.action: Put a stop to catholic and islamic expansion in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Church of England is the church of our state, Henry VIII must be turning in his grave. We must undo the Catholic restoration, and ensure act of supremacy is fully enforced. Stop the buildings of ALL non Anglican buildings in England and Wales.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
